meanings: (강과 큰 내) rivers and broad streams
(양쯔 강과 황허 강) the Yangtze River and the Yellow River
falling, dropping, a fall, a drop, descent, 강하하다 fall, drop, descend, glide down (to)

vlive.korean: 안 져요. - 좀 강하기 때문에 - 어디 가서 잘 안 지죠. They don't lose. - Because they're a bit strong. - They don't lose anywhere they go. 듣기 View video FTISLAND : [FULL] FTISLAND 여름밤의 꿈 COMEBACK VLIVE [DRIVE-IN FTISLAND]

examples.korean: She is known for her patience. 발음듣기 그녀는 인내심이 강하기로 유명하다 Neungyule
examples.english: She is known for her patience. 발음

examples.korean: He is a natural born athlete because he is quick and powerful. 발음듣기 그는 빠르고 강하기 때문에 운동을 하기에 적합하다. Neungyule
examples.english: He is a natural born athlete because he is quick and powerful. 발음

examples.korean: But Jang is stronger and will get the Asian Games title.' 발음듣기 그러나 장미란이 훨씬 강하기 때문에 아시안 게임 우승을 차지할 것이다.' Neungyule
examples.english: But Jang is stronger and will get the Asian Games title.' 발음

examples.korean: Maple wood is used because it is so strong. 발음듣기 단풍나무는 재질이 강하기 때문에 많이 쓰인다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: Maple wood is used because it is so strong. 발음

examples.korean: However, they are famous for being loyal and protective. 발음듣기 그러나 그들은 충성스럽고 보호본능이 강하기로 유명합니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: However, they are famous for being loyal and protective. 발음
